title: Provides that the commissioner of education shall provide students who are in fifth grade or below shall remain in the building unless released to an authorized person
summary: Provides that the commissioner of education shall promulgate rules and regulations which require that students who are in fifth grade or below shall remain in their school building unless released to an authorized person.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of education to promulgate rules and regulations requiring that all students in grade five or below remain at their school unless they are under the supervision of authorized transportation, a parent or guardian or another authorized person
